title: Big Banks Kickoff Earnings Season
itunes:title: Big Banks Kickoff Earnings Season
description:
Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Global Banks Analyst Alison Williams breaks down bank earnings and outlook. Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, shares his thoughts on going from pandemic to endemic. Maja Vujinovic, CEO of OGroup, discusses emerging markets integrating cryptocurrencies. And we Drive to the Close with Darrell Crate, Chairman and Managing Principal of Easterly Investment Partners.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Katie Greifeld. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
